[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@tridion-sites/extensions](./extensions.md) &gt; [useOptionalCategoryEditor](./extensions.useoptionalcategoryeditor.md)

## useOptionalCategoryEditor variable

Provides access to Category Editor data and methods, if available. `undefined` is returned when used outside of Category Editor.

**Signature:**

```typescript
useOptionalCategoryEditor: OptionalCategoryEditorHook;
```
